channel.title: Game Storyline
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape, i'm currently programming a Computer Game, and need some ideas. Right now i'm writing the storyline of how the game is played, and what it's about, but I need some ideas.
I'll give what I have so far:
There is an Ancient King in the land of [b]Miscellatamea, Englasia[/b]. The king's son, [b]Ezekiel[/b] was jealous of his father because his father has more control, and power than him. He wanted to sit on the throne highest of all, a throne apon the sky of his father, a throne that none other can reach but him. His father, [b]Rarru[/b], didn't approve of his wantings. Ezekiel didn't like to obey the laws, as he thought he was a King. Ezekiel then went after his father and tried striking at him. Ezekiel took [b]The legendary blade of Evil's Bane, the Eternal & Nocturnal Darkness Destorying Sword[/b]. The sword was meant for destorying evil, and Rarru was nothing as such. Once he hit Rarru with it, the power of Rarru reflected against the Sword, causing it to hit back at Ezekiel. Since the sword was created for destorying evil, Ezekiel then became weakened. With little thought, he casted a curse apon the town of Miscellatamea, and then left to the Sacred realm of Etceteria, with Miscellatamea.
Any ideas? This is how the game starts.

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

[quote author=jme link=topic=388150.msg2908840#msg2908840 date=1249963130]
What language are you making this game with?
[/quote[quote=“n33bz0rpl0x, post:18, topic:293331”]So let me guess, you’re creating a game storyline that steals a region in runescape, and a town, cool, and i guess the sword of “destorying” Destroys too, right?[/quote]

No, i’m not taking regions of RuneScape out. Noob.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

The Reaper X:

Make it about something other than medieval times, mythical creatures, magic, sword-involved, etc, etc, etc.

I took Collage Classes on Medievil Literature. Medievil times is my favorite time periods.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:13, topic:293331”][quote author=–BBLLAARRGGHH– link=topic=388150.msg2903502#msg2903502 date=1249671493]
Yeah, RuneScape has gods, and how many people like that?
[/quote]
It ha it’s own gods. I mean that people get upset when religious figures are used.[/quote]

In the game, there are no Gods. ‘Ezekiel’ calls himself, and thinks he’s a God, but he’s not.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d

@rip4d wrote:

Still, you shouldn’t have anything related to the bible in a video game. Many people do get upset because of this.

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:7, topic:293331”][quote author=Lord of fallen Angels link=topic=388150.msg2902061#msg2902061 date=1249586115]
Lol…Long ago, when God was creating Earth, he created an Angel, named Satan Lucifer. Satan became jealous of God because God was more powerful. Satan gathered up some Angels, and created his own Kingdom called Hell, and became his own God.
[/quote]
Now I’m pretty sure that Satan is the devil and Lucifer was one of God’s Archangels. Besides…this whole plot sounds too much like Zelda. Sacred realm and the name Rarru (Raru is a sage in OoT) are just too closely related, more so the sword of evil’s bane (Master Sword in just about every Zelda game).[/quote]

Yes, I took some names from Zelda into my game, but it isn’t like zelda. There are some stuff that is like zelda, but it isn’t really Zelda.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Depends on what you’re reading. To me every book that talks about the devil and god are untruthful. I believe in the science of it all.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Lord of fallen Angels:

Lol…Long ago, when God was creating Earth, he created an Angel, named Satan Lucifer. Satan became jealous of God because God was more powerful. Satan gathered up some Angels, and created his own Kingdom called Hell, and became his own God.

Now I’m pretty sure that Satan is the devil and Lucifer was one of God’s Archangels. Besides…this whole plot sounds too much like Zelda. Sacred realm and the name Rarru (Raru is a sage in OoT) are just too closely related, more so the sword of evil’s bane (Master Sword in just about every Zelda game).

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

Okay, now tell me this, Is it a multiplayer game? or a straight on by yourself game…?

If it is indeed, a multi-player game, i want to be the first to see the modeling, if its a “by yourself” game, i’ll try it out, but i won’t be that interested into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Storyline
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

[quote=“elijah101, post:4, topic:293331”][quote author=Lord of fallen Angels link=topic=388150.msg2902061#msg2902061 date=1249586115]
Lol…Long ago, when God was creating Earth, he created an Angel, named Satan Lucifer. Satan became jealous of God because God was more powerful. Satan gathered up some Angels, and created his own Kingdom called Hell, and became his own God.
[/quote]

Hmm. how is this “game” going to look show some pics?, maybe that would make the story line more interesting atm. i would use that game as an insult.[/quote]

I’m still making the character models, and the game isn’t completed complete. Right now i’m working on the Story of the game, how it’s played, everything people say, etc…

Read full topic
